thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Umar Qadri
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Umar Qadri

author: Umar Qadri
title: Umar Qadri
text: Thank you so much for the personalized and sincere delivery of the wedding ring I had ordered for my fiance. Erica walked and talked me through every step of the process and I answered all of my nervous questions. The entire team is fantastic and yesterday I was able to finally give the ring to my fiance. She absolutely loved it and I am so happy to have worked with such sincere and professional people. I have no complaints and will fully recommend this company to anyone
